targets.expr:
sum by (stage) (
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}"}))
    * on (stage) group_left ()
    (
        (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="ready"}))
        + on (stage)
        (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="pending"}))
    )
)

avg by (stage) (
    ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}"} * on (SessionName, NodeAddress, GpuIndex) group_left
    label_replace(ray_node_gpus_utilization{SessionName=~"${session}"}, "NodeAddress","$1","ip", "(.+)")
)

avg by (stage) (
    ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}", stage="Stage07-QwenCaption"} * on (SessionName, NodeAddress, GpuIndex) group_left
    label_replace(ray_node_gpus_utilization{SessionName=~"${session}"}, "NodeAddress","$1","ip", "(.+)")
)

avg by (stage) (
    ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}"} * on (SessionName, NodeAddress, GpuIndex) group_left
    label_replace(ray_node_gram_used{SessionName=~"${session}"}, "NodeAddress","$1","ip", "(.+)")
)

sum (
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}"}))
    * on (stage) group_left ()
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="running"}))
)
/ on () group_left
sum (
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_stage_gpu_alloc{SessionName=~"${session}"}))
    * on (stage) group_left ()
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="ready"}))
    
)

sum by (stage) (
    max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_resource_request{SessionName=~"${session}"})
    * on (stage) group_left
    max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="ready"})
)

sum (
sum by (stage) (
    max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_resource_request{SessionName=~"${session}"})
    * on (stage) group_left
    max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="ready"})
)
)

(
    sum by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_resource_usage{SessionName=~"${session}", stage!="", resource="cpu"})
)
/ on (stage)
(
    sum by (stage) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state="running"})
)
/ 100
sum by (stage, state) (ray_pipeline_actor_count{SessionName=~"${session}", state!="ready", state!="pending", stage="${stage}"})

(max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_schedule_task_count_total{SessionName=~"${session}", affinity="local"}))
/ on (stage) group_left ()
(
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_schedule_task_count_total{SessionName=~"${session}", affinity="local"}))
    + on (stage) group_left ()
    (max by (stage) (ray_pipeline_schedule_task_count_total{SessionName=~"${session}", affinity="remote"}))
)
